text: Pentti Uolevi Tiusanen (6 March 1949 â€“ 8 December 2018) was a Finnish politician. He was born in Kotka, Finland. He was a member of Finnish Parliament, representing the Left Alliance. He was elected to Finnish Parliament in 1995. He left office in 2011. Tiusanen died on 8 December 2018 from stomach cancer in Helsinki, aged 69. ==References== ==Other websites== *Parliament of Finland: Pentti Tiusanen *Home page Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Finnish politicians Category:Cancer deaths in Finland Category:Deaths from stomach cancer
title: Pentti Tiusanen
